AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: farm sheep
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a farmer with less-than-ethical business practices, and quickly made [PAWN_nameDef] part of the sheep flock. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped before being shorn, and fled with [PAWN_possessive] fleece still on [PAWN_possessive] back.
